name: The Solivagants (or, Videogames Suck at Character Context)
name_original: The Solivagants (or, Videogames Suck at Character Context)
description:
A playful examination of Character Context; a long-neglected aspect of game design and technological development.

This is my entry for the Bitsy Essay Jam 2020, run by Em Reed in collaboration with Critical Distance.
